trial_type.Description: Describes the type of trial including the instruction and go cues with their respective outcomes.

Levels.instruction_jackpot: The instruction cue, i.e., where to reach. This is a jackpot trial, i.e., $1.60 if successful, or $0.00 if too slow.
Levels.instruction_robber: The instruction cue, i.e., where to reach. This is a robber trial, i.e., $0.00 if successful, or a loss of $1.60 if too slow.
Levels.instruction_standard: The instruction cue, i.e., where to reach. This is a standard trial, i.e., $0.20 if successful, or $0.00 if too slow.
Levels.go_jackpot: The go cue. This is a jackpot trial.
Levels.go_robber: The go cue. This is a robber trial.
Levels.go_standard: The go cue. This is a standard trial.

outcome.Description: Describes the outcome of the trial.

Levels.too_slow: Target not reached before deadline on this trial.
Levels.success: Target reached before deadline on this trial.

initiation_time.Description: Time taken for centroid of cursor to leave the radius of the starting position after appearance of the go cue.

completion_time.Description: Time taken for entire trial to be completed from the go cue, including the reach and a 0.8 second hold at the target.
